name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Treasury Systems Architect/Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **Cloud systems** and **troubleshooting** for high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Proficient in **monitoring**, **configuration management**, and incident & escalation handling to ensure seamless treasury operations and payment processes. Demonstrated ability to manage complex **data flows** and implement efficient systems administration practices while maintaining a strong attention to detail.

Skilled in deploying applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, bringing a strong technical background in various frameworks and languages, including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with proficiency in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building enterprise platforms with robust **AI/ML capabilities** for automated real-time analytics and decision-making. Strong microservices architecture understanding with hands-on expertise in CI/CD automation, ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

Adept at knowledge sharing and mentoring junior team members, driven by a passion for developing technically sound solutions that make a real-world impact.

Streamlined incident and escalation handling procedures, reducing average incident response time by **40%** through improved documentation and communication.
